Post.title: centos7mysql
Post._content:
## 

-  centos7  350  680...
-  ssh  ssh 
-  mysql

##  mysql

#### 

```javascript
yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ ncurses ncurses-devel cmake bison
```

###### yum  rpm 

- yum Yellow dog Updater Modified  yellow dog  Terra Soft  python  yup(yellow dog updater) Linux@Duke 
- yum / rpm  rpm 
- rpm linux  windows  exe 

####  mysql 

```javascript
rpm -qa | grep mysql 
yum remove mysql mysql-server mysql-libs compat-mysql51 
rm -rf /var/lib/mysql
rm /etc/my.cnf
rpm -qa|grep mysql 
whereis mysql 
```

-  rpm -e 

####  Mysql  repo 

```javascript
mkdi /usr/local/download
cd /usr/local/download/
wget http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm
wget http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm
```

####  mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm 

```javascript
rpm -ivh mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm //rpm -ivh
```

####  mysql

- yum install -y mysql-community-server

####  MySQL 

- service mysqld restart

####  MySQL 

```javascript
ps -ef | grep mysql
netstat -tunpl | grep 3306
```

- ps  Process Status 
- ps ps  ps  top [ps ](https://linuxtools-rst.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/latest/tool/ps.html#id7)
- netstat 

####  mysql 

- grep 'temporary password' /var/log/mysqld.log
- 

```javascript
mysql -u root
use mysql;
update user set password=password('123456') where user='root';
delete from user where user='';//
systemctl restart mysql//mysql
```

#### 

-  3306 

```javascript
systemctl start firewalld.service //
firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=3306/tcp
firewall-cmd --reload
```

- 

```javascript
mysql -u root -p
use mysql;
update user set host='%' where user='root' and host='localhost';
exit
systemctl restart mysql//mysql
```

## 

-  mysql [](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/25471.html)
- [ 3306 ](https://blog.csdn.net/u010955892/article/details/72774920)

let sourceMap = require("source-map");

*  http  Content-Type
* Content-Type  MIME 
* 
  * URLencodedapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded
  * mutipart:mutipart/form-data
  * json:application/json
  * xml:text/xml
  * text/plain
* html  form  urlencodedmutipart  plain text  enctype 
* ajax  json 

### URLencoded

> form  enctype  urlencoded

```javascript
<form  method='post' enctype='application/x-www-form-urlencoded'>
  <input type="text" name='title'>
  <input type="text" name='subtitle'>
  <input type="submit">
</form>
//http
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
//
title=test&subtitle=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD=>base64urlchromedecodeURI
```

### JSON

```javascript
$.post('/xxx', {
    title: 'test',
    content: [1,2,3]
});
Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
//
{"title":"test","content":[1,2,3]}
```

### XML

```javascript
Content-Type: text/xml
//
<!--?xml version="1.0"?-->
<methodcall>
    <methodname>examples.getStateName</methodname>
    <params>
        <param>
            <value><i4>41</i4></value>
    </params>
</methodcall>
```
